con:testSuite.name: TestCases

con:testCase.name: Get number of subscribers in corporate
Get all unallocated subscribers in corporate
Get number of users in corporate
Get number of users without service
Get current logged in admin info

con:config.script: def testProject = testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project testProject.setPropertyValue("testCaseName", "Corporates/id") testProject.setPropertyValue("testStepName", "Update corporate") log.info "Setup of testcase: "+testProject.getPropertyValue("testCaseName")+" done"

xmlns:v="http://www.vodafone.com/vf/core_common/types/v.0.2/"> <soapenv:Header/> <soapenv:Body> <prov:updateServiceIn> <!--Optional:--> <arg0> <traceIdentifier> used: <v:correlationID>?</v:correlationID>--> <v:identityID>${#Global#IdentityID}</v:identityID> </traceIdentifier> <opcoID>1</opcoID> <opcoCustomerID>${#Project#MsisdnNotProv}</opcoCustomerID>
